Text.Language: Wcanna qen n/et[oci: vai pe p~ouro m~Pic~ra/l: f~c~marwout n~je v/eyn/ou: qen v~ran m~P[oic n~te nijom.
Hosanna in the highest, this is the King of Israel, blessed is He who comes in the name, of the Lord of hosts.
